ProductInfo.Features:
This is a CCTV security digital video recorder camera, not a real lamp. Just insert a Micro-SD card into the camera, screw-in like a bulb, and turn on the power, it will automatically record video and bring security into environments like home, office, factory, shopping mall, restaurant, etc. Easy installation and easy operation: just insert a Micro-SD card into the camera, screw the camera in like a bulb, and turn on the power.
With high quality cover, it looks like a real bulb with no light generated. Thieves would not discover it.
Local storage: it supports 2GB-32GB Micro-SD card to record videos (Micro-SD card is not included in the package).
All setting changes and updates can be quickly and easily done on micro-SD card. Adopts 3rd generation LED array, ensures better image at night and longer service life.
Comes with a card reader and a 200mm long extension adapter. Accept AC 110V - 250V for worldwide usage.
ProductInfo.Name: E27 Bulb CCTV Home Security DVR Camera Digital Video Recorder Night Vision
